website_summaries.verdict: Large-breed dogs need equally large treats. The answer: these 12-inch, braided bullies that combine three thinner sticks into one massive treat. These bully sticks are a bit lower in odor than most other such treats.
pros: Large enough to keep your dog occupied for hours
Chewing helps clean your dog's teeth and keeps him out of boredom-induced trouble
From free-range, grass-fed bulls in Paraguay, with no additives, chemicals, preservatives, or added color
cons: The large size means the smell will be around longer, too
While less likely to be a problem than rawhide treats, it is possible for bully sticks to block your dog's stomach or intestines, particularly if he swallows large chunks

website_summaries.verdict: This is the way to go if you're interested in a high quality treat your dog will enjoy for hours. When done your furry friend will have cleaner teeth as well.
pros: FDA, USDA, and others certify the process in South America
Most dogs really enjoy the flavor and it is high in protein and also easily digested
cons: Some consumers complain about the price point, and yet you may get what you pay for when it comes to quality and health aspects

customer_reviews.title: Canine to Canine
customer_reviews.text: Tyson, I applaud you and the pack for the taste, texture, and long lasting feature of the braided bully sticks. As one who pretty much finishes any and all chew products in a 1/2 second, you have challenged me and it worked. My hooman is very happy that I'm occupied while she works and not begging for constant attention. Count on a reorder from my pack----I have three sisters! Bark right back at ya, Max
customer_reviews.author: MB Golden Lover

customer_reviews.title: Lack of consistent quality
customer_reviews.text: I switched to Pawstruck because Red Barn started sending scraps. I got two orders from Pawstruck that were very acceptable. I just received my third order and have immediately cancelled my subscription. The current package of 10 braided pizzles weighs less than one pound. I weighed the remaining 5 pizzles from my last shipment and they weigh 3 pounds. I will never buy from Pawstruck again. The photo shows the average size of the current shipment compared to the average size of the previous shipments.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS W STARKS

customer_reviews.title: They are BIG!
customer_reviews.text: My lab loves these things, he is a very aggressive chewer and the other sticks we got him only lasted about 3 minutes. These sticks last up to an hour with him. To give some comparison he has chewed through a nylabone in about 3 days. These things are great and the quality is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Moses Andrew Calderon

customer_reviews.title: I did not note that these come from Paraguay. ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not note that these come from Paraguay. Although by dog loves them and we will keep them, I am not sure that they are not treated with something and have doubts about ordering them again. Many dog items come from countries that do not have the same standards for labeling and for product supervision that we do in the US.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Dog's Happy Chewing
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this product! I'm liking the price and that it lasts for awhile. He's got something that takes a few days, rather than a few minutes to chew up. Dog and dog's sidekick are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent - disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been experimenting with multiple brands of bully sticks, and I was so hopeful for Pawstruck as it had such good reviews. My dog does love the one I’ve given him so far, but I’m disappointed with the lack of quality control, where the number of small braids and just how small they are (seen in my picture) does not match what is advertised. Also, odor is almost as bad as the worst offender in my 6-brand lineup - not what I expected when advertised as low odor. For the disappointing half inch wide small braids in the bag, the price per braid is not worth it. If they all were the advertised size, that would change.
customer_reviews.author: D Z

customer_reviews.title: Wow...they are big
customer_reviews.text: Grabbed them fast during a lightning deal. They are HUGE so I have to find something to help me cut them in half for my 2 ShihTzus. Haven't seen this quality since I used to buy direct from PetEdge. They have not chewed on them yet but just by looks alone it should keep them busy. Running sales every so often would be a nice incentive since bully sticks in general have become disproportionately expensive. It's not like they come from Wagyu cows!!! Now I think of them as a "luxury" item for my pets and maybe some pups have never even tried one because its not affordable in some households.
customer_reviews.author: spitfire

customer_reviews.title: I didn't have a chance to answer them right away and when i did they let me know that the product I selected would not be longlasting for a dog like Gabe. They end him a free one f ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a braided product from this company and he devoured it in minutes. I wrote review and Pawstruck emailed me and asked is there was something else i wanted to try. I didn't have a chance to answer them right away and when i did they let me know that the product I selected would not be longlasting for a dog like Gabe. They end him a free one f these bully sticks and it lasted. Right after I bought a package of them. They are awesome and so is Pawstruck.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: 1st pack I ordered were great. Each pack thereafter thin and low quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 month old Rottweiler. The first pack I bought was well worth the money all of the sticks were thick and of high-quality. It would take my Roottie several days to go through one. Each subsequent pack that I ordered were a lot thinner and shorter with one piece a bit thicker than the all the others. My rottie would go through one in 30 minutes. the quality went from a 10 (out of 10) to a 2. Night and day difference from the first pack i ordered to the last. I Will look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: sregrahc ds

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are super fast chewers and these took them almost an hour ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually get my pitbulls the regular bully sticks but decided to go a different route (plus there happened to be a flash sale on Amazon). I don't know if I'll be able to go back to the old ones now. My dogs are super fast chewers and these took them almost an hour to go through. There was very little odor and my dogs loved them. They shipped super fast and arrived as expected. The only thing I would change would be for them to have a zipper or some way to reseal them, but that won't stop me from ordering more in the future. Highly recommend for voracious chewers
customer_reviews.author: emiliey

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves chewing for hours!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these!! They last for such a long time. And I do have to agree that they are low odor She chews for hours on these! I was not sure at first about ordering, so I decided to order once to see if worth the money. Yep, definitely worth it! So, I have ordered three times now! Great product. Keeps her busy and away from my shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Anjulgurl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chews for Teething Pups
customer_reviews.text: My dog, Sterling really likes these Braided Bully Sticks. He's a 16 week old Standard Poodle pup and the needs good things to chew on that aren't loaded with chemicals. He's teething and wants good stuff to chew on besides slippers, furniture and woodwork. So far he is learning that he must stick to his stuff...Good Puppy!
customer_reviews.author: ccurve8

customer_reviews.title: Company should send me another package.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered these numerous times for my dogs. In this package the sticks are about 1/4 the size they have been. My dog chewed through half a stick in 1 hr. and it used to take several days. I didn’t mind paying $50 for dog chews because they would last. The size of one whole stick now is the size of what a piece of the braided stick used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan A. Witt

customer_reviews.title: My two dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were cheaper my dogs absolutely flip over these. They last for my large dogs just about two days so I only give them once a month as a big treat or when having a party to distract them. I would by them all the time if I could afford to.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Natalicchio

customer_reviews.title: Very thin “braided bully sticks” that are over-priced.
customer_reviews.text: We have been ordering these braided bully sticks for quite some time. I’ve noticed that over time they have become much thinner than they originally were. I thought that maybe it was just a one-time thing, and continued to order. Unfortunately that was not the case, as the next two orders were of the same quality. Definitely not worth the hefty price, I will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Doodle Mom

customer_reviews.title: REALLY REALLY STINKY in 12 pack quantities— Rotten meat smell!  AVOID!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these more than once in smaller amounts and before have always been pleased— as a result I splurged on the 12-pack, I truly, truly wish I had not done so. For $70 I expected the product I’d received before. These LOOK the same, however they smell horribly of rotten meat so something is clearly amiss. It may be too late for me to exchange them, however I will NOT buy in such quantities online ever again. Too much cash outlay and apparently no certainty of quality. If money not a concern (or if it is), buy the smaller packs. We opened this one when those were finished— what an awful, dreadful surprise. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Made our dog very sick.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy...it’s 3:00am and I am writing this review ...my mini Goldendoodle is on his 3rd round tonight of diarrhea after having one of these. The same thing happened a few nights ago after having one of these sticks. We have bought many of these locally and have never had a problem, but this brand has caused us and our dog to have painful and sleepless nights.
customer_reviews.author: Harley3904

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Big puppies & dogs who love to chew!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my Lab-Pitt puppy, who loves to chew, chew, chew!!! She loves the taste & I love the low-odor of these braided bully sticks! Great product & will definitely do business with again! 5 Paws Up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting Sticks
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 month old Lab puppy goes through Bully sticks fairly quickly. The standard 6 inch sticks are a waste on money as he swallows them after only chewing a few minutes. The standard 12” don’t last much longer. We give him a stick when we eat dinner and these Pawstruck sticks lasted two evenings. Each over 1/2 hour of chewing and he didn’t swallow until second night after taking apart the braided sections and about 3” pieces, so should digest better. Still expensive happy but the best stick we have found thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great but didn't last very long for the $$
customer_reviews.text: My boys both love them but I got them to keep them busy for a while so they wouldn't get board and eat my house. I have 1 yr old pitty and bulldog/beagle mix. both got through this in under an hour. These are apparently tasty and it didn't upset their stomachs, The ones I received are not stinky at all and we have purchased many bully sticks brands over the past year. The major downside is that they are very expensive for less than an hour worth of busy time. I may purchase them for special occasions only....bummer I was hoping this would do. for $2 I could get a yak stick that lasts for hours
customer_reviews.author: Heather Riehl

customer_reviews.title: Best bully we have tried!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried the single bully: 6" and 12". My Golden Retriever devours them in one sitting. We tried the Pawstruck braided bullies and they are the best so far! Last the longest. I prefer the 12", as the 6" is quickly eaten up by my dog. The 12" seems to last longer for some reason...more than twice as long. We only give our dog the bully during meals when he is on his bed (and not under the table). One 12" bully will last 2-3 meals. They do have a smell, but I only notice when opening the bag. While the dog is chewing on one 2 feet away there is no smell. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wolsborn

customer_reviews.title: Great product for keeping dogs occupied and out of trouble!
customer_reviews.text: My new rescue dog 🐕 , Peyton, loves these! I was looking for something that would keep him occupied while I was feeding my other two, and these work like a charm. They are quite big and hard enough so that it takes Peyton a day or two to finish one. Of course, Peyton is kind of big, but only 6 months old, so someone with a more experienced or larger dog may find they don't last as long. The braids make them last longer than a regular bullystick, however. So far, they agree with him, and he loves them, so I will be buying more when these are gone!
customer_reviews.author: Sneakypie

customer_reviews.title: Just what a dog loves: smelly and delicious
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love them. Beware the smell. My boys go crazy but are quite potent so if you haven't ever use bully sticks before, be warned! But they do satisfy my dogs and I got them bigger ones to take longer for them to chew. Been a huge success over here
customer_reviews.author: RDEAL

customer_reviews.title: Delivered as advertised, and the dogs are happy!
customer_reviews.text: I usually order large, braided bully rings, but they're out of stock and both my dogs are big chewers. They certainly seem to like these, as they each took one as soon as they arrived and ran off to different spots to start chewing. I'm not sure I'd describe them as "low odor", as there's a fairly noticeable smell once they've been chewed on for a while, but it's not terrible. While these aren't cheap, they're a decent size and, assuming they last a while, they're a pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: Seems

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Treats
customer_reviews.text: My Golden loves these bully sticks! Was very happy they arrived earlier than expected. She enjoys these and it’s nice they take a while for her to get through.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan

customer_reviews.title: High quality Bully sticks
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd or 4th time I've ordered them. My dog loves them and actually last for more than 10 minutes. This company had some especially large ones that I really like and definitely last longer. My 9 month old lab can got through 1 in a day if he is motivated. I will definitely continue to order more!
customer_reviews.author: dean burridge

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHEWS!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had big dogs for most of my life, while the chews smell horrible I can give them to my pups without having to worry. They are animal based and easy to digest. They chew well and don't cause gum bleeds. I have used them for my dogs well over 10 years and they are always #1 favorite. We don't buy any other chews since this one is and always will be the best choice. (For size reference, I have a 5 pound all the way to GSD and Great Danes)
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: She doesn't like smelly things
customer_reviews.text: My hooman thought these were mighty tasty. Well, I let her know, she didn't try them herself. She doesn't like smelly things. I found them so tasty that I even shared one with a friend (well only 1/2 of one since I chewed the other half first). I like to chew them at dinner time so I leave my hoomans alone while they eat. I hope she gets me more when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Selwa

customer_reviews.title: Great bully stix!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. I didn't want to give them rawhide anymore but they needed something to chew for their teeth. I have 4 dogs and the 5 pack worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Substantial,  great for heavy chewers
customer_reviews.text: We have these on recurring order. They are substantial, and take the dogs quite a while to finish them up. We have Boston Terriers, heavy chewers, and these really let them go to town on the chewing. We were getting single stick ones, and our chewers could easily finish a stick in a day. I can't afford that lol. These are great. The smell is nicely muted after they have been out of the package a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A Dean

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting a long lasting chew
customer_reviews.text: After reading the amazon reviews I was expecting an all day chew for my Shar-Pitty mix. but he devoured it in 30 minutes. that's how long it takes him to tear through a compressed rawhide bone too. He really loved this chew and digested it well. the raw hides give him "leave the room" gas. For $10 a stick I was hoping it would last for a few hours at least. I don't think this is a great option for aggressive chewers. The cool thing was that I tweeted to the company about it and they responded quickly to explain power chewers could eliminate these chews quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jgregg42

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and short lasting
customer_reviews.text: There’s 2 really thin sticks 1 thick one and two moderately thick. A bit of a ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Wimawep

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting chew for aggressive chewers
customer_reviews.text: Been searching for a chew bone that my dog doesn’t demolish within 10 minutes and these didn’t stand a chance against my olde English bullie. I got the 12in bones. Far too expensive for my guy who destroyed the thing in an instant. I like that it’s all natural cow penis and my dog seemed to enjoy the taste, not sure what that says about him... I guess the search continues.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved them, but they were short 11”
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved these, they lasted a good long time, and they were solid. They were pretty thick, not like the others where you might get a thin one in the mix. My only complaint was they weren’t the length advertised. I measured and they came up short. I contacted the vendor and did get refunded for the difference. I’m sorry for the customers who didn’t catch this, as the vendor profited greatly since I’m sure I wasn’t the only person from this batch who got shorted.
customer_reviews.author: Mshl

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these for my two Dobermans. I have an old man and a young pup. The young pup is crazy in the morning but mellows out in a few hours. The braided bully stick keep her busy for a couple of hours and by the time she’s done with it, she’s mellowed out already. Keeps her from being destructive while I’m at work. It’s the only thing that works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought the quality of this product was exceptional. I have a large German Shepherd puppy who is a very aggressive chewer so she needs a nice big, thick bully stick. My 1st & 2nd orders did not disappoint, but I have noticed as I have reordered , the quality is inconsistent. The majority of the bullysticks in my 10 pack have been very thin, compared to recent orders. It's disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia I.

customer_reviews.title: Texas Lexus (Lex) thanks Pawstruck:)))
customer_reviews.text: My human says I'm a Perfect German Shepherd Dog, and she bought me a Perfect Gift ~ Pawstruck Braided Bully Sticks. Yum, they smell and taste so good and, despite my best efforts, they last forever. The only downside is that my human puts my bully stick away at bedtime.....says she can't monitor me when she's sleeping. I think that's humiliating for a Perfect German Shepherd Dog, but she's the boss. Pawstruck and Lex are friends forever:)
customer_reviews.author: lark

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will love these!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! My dogs love these Bully sticks! They are a little more on the expensive side but you get what you pay for. When the box arrives my lab can smell them and gets so excited. I have ordered multiple times from this vendor and have never been disappointed. The only complaint I have is the shipping takes a little longer than typical Prime orders but the product itself is excellent! When the package arrives they know and it’s opened by the pups before the humans. My only complaint is the shipping takes too long.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Safe for my puppies
customer_reviews.text: My two 4 month old labs love these! I break them in half (with a saw because they’re so durable) so the doggies can share one. They usually last a few days if I only allow them to chew on them in 20 minute increments. They haven’t given my guys any tummy issues so that’s great! They’re a lifesaver for these teething hyper guys! It keeps them occupied and not chewing on my furniture!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Usually Good, But
customer_reviews.text: Our last order of Braided Bully Sticks apparently was not baked long enough or some other problem has occurred. Usually the sticks stay braided until there is only 2-3 inches remaining. This last order, our dog has been able to separate the sticks with at least 6-7 inches remaining. We do not want him ingesting the sticks whole (uneaten) for fear of digestive blockages. These are not cheap and the expectation that they last is not unreasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased these bully sticks, I averaged out the price between them and what I pay individually at my local big-box-store and thought it was a good deal. When I received these bully sticks, I was pleasantly surprised to see the size each stick was about 3" longer, and they are the exact same quality. I will definitely buy these again, except it may take me a while. Although my boy loves them, he's not much of a chewer anymore, so takes him a while to get through one. I would definitely recommend this product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: CRich808

customer_reviews.title: These make my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: My dog, a King Charles, gets sick and throws up every time he chews on one of these. I purchased a pack of 5, and he's only been offered one of them. After chewing on it for 5 minutes, he threw up. The first time I thought was just a coincidence, so I let him chew on it again with the same results. I don't know what the policy is on returning them after being opened, but there was no way to know that they would make him sick if they weren't opened.
customer_reviews.author: Carol W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pup and humans happy
customer_reviews.text: These arrived promptly much to my pup’s delight. As another reviewer noted bully sticks provide wonderful respite for us humans. Our 11 week old Labrador pup had no problems managing these large braided sticks. They are about an inch wide. The first one out of the package measured just over 12”. Twelve inches gives us about 10 inches of bully stick because when she gets down to the last couple of inches we’ll take it away so it doesn’t get swallowed. I like that these are braided as I believe it will last her longer than a single strand 12” stick. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Beavers

customer_reviews.title: My little pack LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: These last longer than anything else that I have purchased, so I got the monthly subscription. One of these took my 5 year old pitbull about two hours to devour. In the same amount of time, my 4 month old plott hound had eaten about 1/2 a stick, and my 3 month old mastiff/boxer had only eaten about 1/4. I don’t think they have a terrible odor; it’s about as strong as a beef bone. They come in a resealable bag, and I store leftover sticks in that. I alternate 30 to 45 minute chewing sessions of bully sticks, yak chews, beef bones, turkey necks, and whatever new treat my husband brings home.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth F.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t be buying these again
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this product. Packaged well and looked fresh (as fresh as a bull pizzle is capable of looking, anyway ;P) but they gave all three of my dogs horrible diarrhea the day after they ate them. Even the one who has an “iron stomach” and whose had many other brands of pizzles (and grosser; think freeze dried duck heads, chicken feet, organ meats, etc.) without any stomach upset. Will not repurchase or recommend based on this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Suzabelle

customer_reviews.title: We are as excited as the dog when these arrive
customer_reviews.text: We have a shepherd/lab mix. Perhaps these take a long time for some dogs, but she usually plows through these in around 30 minutes. Every so often she keeps them around for a couple of days. So, yes, our dog loves them and it keeps her busy for a little while. There does not seem to be a smell like with some we've tried. They are expensive, but still on par with other similar, high-quality items in the store or online.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: My chihuahuas love these!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my chihuahuas! Technically for bigger dogs but my chihuahuas are aggressive chewers! They love them! Helps keep my chihuahuas from getting bored enough to go after my shoes and text books, and I believe it helps with their teeth. I have also given my chihuahuas the cow hooves - which they also love.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Colucci

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 27-pound power chewer! These are made in this country so I felt safer buying them and in a 5-pack, they’ve been lasting at the very least-two weeks. (We also have four other dogs who love them and pick them up if they are left for even a second!). They smell a little icky, but consider what they actually are! I’m super happy with how durable they are and they keep my boy busy (and out of trouble!) for at least a couple days!
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Expensive. Last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: These are somewhat ridiculously priced. They do last. I can take one away from pup after about an hour and save it for later. He will actually take a rest from one but will finish it off overnight if I forget to take it away. That makes for a pricey snack. Low odor, no residue. Like others I’m investing a small fortune in bully sticks.
customer_reviews.author: BLou

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dog
customer_reviews.text: Based on my dog's positive reaction, this a great product. She thoroughly enjoying chewing on these from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Marie

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and other...
customer_reviews.text: I was drawn to this order because of the large size and supposedly 'low order.' These smelled bad in the packaging. My golden chewed on one for an afternoon and these are the worst smelling AND these gave my dog diarrhea for three days. No others have given the her the same problem. Sorry to post this bad of review...but will stick with my standard brand unfortunately not on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: hanssimon

customer_reviews.title: WAS ENJOYED
customer_reviews.text: MY 162lbs English mastiff is aggressive to the point that extras thick, jumbo, monsters does not matter they are all chewed through 10-12 minutes ! She loves them, I Smear skippy peanut butter all over it ! I rate them on enjoyment not on the length of the chew ! Watching khloe tear through her bully sticks !
customer_reviews.author: John R. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Smelly but long-lasting entertainment for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 month old Standard Poodle and he loves to chew. Having these around the house makes sure that he chooses some appropriate rather than my baseboards or table legs. They last a few days and he absolutely loves them. No marks on the carpet or wood floors, but they definitely stinkif he's been focusing on them for a while and they're softened up. Worth it, though in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: smiller

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE - the 25 pack of bully sticks is not a good buy...
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased the 25 pack of these bully sticks. We had previously purchased several 5 packs. BEWARE that the 25 pack has lighter braids that can be eaten much faster than the wider ones. We thought we were saving money buying the 25 pack but actually paid more. We are very disappointed as there was no mention of the size difference.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Very inconsistent sizes.
customer_reviews.text: This order received was package on the right, tiny sticks. Package on the left was from a previous order. Not set up to exchange for item ordered. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Anita McGrew

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves, but does not last
customer_reviews.text: Puppy loves these! It's expensive, but at least I hope that it's free range and without steroids and chemicals, etc. I do wish they lasted longer and wish the price tag was friendlier. Otherwise, puppy loves chomping away. OH, it makes him very thirsty, so have water nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Bully vs. rawhide
customer_reviews.text: Depending on if you dog can handle rawhide (mine can) these were an expensive test. Doberman goes through these like I go through toilet paper. (used to) So, a nice pack of thick USA rawhides is half the price and last 3x as long for my large dog.
customer_reviews.author: Dy

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these....
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoys the bully sticks very much. He is almost 90 pounds so he can go through quite a few of them each week. The only thing I dislike is how expensive they are. But I love my dog and I like to be able to give him things he enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: WillowWren

customer_reviews.title: My not-aggressive chewer mowed through these
customer_reviews.text: I gave my older chow chow mix one of these, thinking it would keep her entertained for at least an hour, and hopefully a few days. Nope. In less than 30 minutes, she ate 2/3 of one of these chews. I had high hopes that they would last a LOT longer given that they are $8/per chew. Would not buy again nor would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Doggo gives them 10 stars!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! No smell, no mess. My only reservation is my over sized, 50# Sheltie eats them too fast! He can devour the entire 12" stick in about 4 days. I do take it away from him at the first walk-away/leave it or he'd probably spend all day on it. He was devouring them so quickly (I have to toss the last 3 or 4 inches or he'd swallow them) that I bought some jumbo unbraided 6" sticks from another fine company to replace them. "Meh, not nearly as good, Mom!" I'm buying more of these :)
customer_reviews.author: Patti Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great value - and peace at last!
customer_reviews.text: Our pup is a terrific little alarm system - especially when the mail comes or someone walks past the house. I needed something to distract him so I could hold video conference events from home for work and these are perfect! He loves these braids! Yes they are smelly - but I’ve bought worse and these are treats so it’s manageable. They last way longer than the curls or straight bully sticks so the value is terrific! We let him have them for short bursts of time and one of these will last for 5 cumulative hours! He’s destroyed “indestructible toys” in less than 15 minutes before - so that’s huge!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E Prillaman

customer_reviews.title: My dog is a fan!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy, Pepper, loves the 12-inch braided bully sticks and I'm so glad! Since I bought them for Pepper, she's stopped chewing on our baseboards so it's money well spent. The company is awesome, too. I wrote to ask a few questions and their response was immediate and, oh, so helpful! I think I'll be a customer for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Klovee

customer_reviews.title: 1st order was excellent. 2nd order was very much lacking.
customer_reviews.text: First time I ordered 50 twisted Bully Sticks they were fantastic. Lasted almost a day. Second order was far from fantastic. They were very very thin. My dogs went through them in about 15 minutes. Price was the same for both 1st & 2nd orders. The first order was a bargain the second I feel I over paid.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M. Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Pricey treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog (Standard Poodle) loves these things. Of course he does. They cost a fortune. One of these will last him a couple of days. At this price they break the bank. He gets them on an infrequent basis. Wish I could afford to give him more. At least this way it is more of a treat. I’m sure that he would give these five stars. I have to give three until the price comes down.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: If anything it's too good.
customer_reviews.text: The dog loves these bully sticks so much she tears through them within a matter of hours. We have to regulate how long she has the sticks to make sure they last. We bought them to keep her occupied, and they keep her 100% occupied until we take the stick away. She LOVES these things.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this before
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this once before and reordered it, the first delivery was great and worth the money so I reordered, the second order I was sadly disapointed that the product was half the size as the first package, I do not feel ti was worth the amount of money I paid for it, I will not chance it again
customer_reviews.author: Nancebelieves2

customer_reviews.title: Smelly...
customer_reviews.text: Woooooowee...these things reek! 🤢 My dog seems to love it and they seem like they will last a bit (she is a power chewer). I had this brand before in the smaller bully chews and I did not really notice a smell with them. These smell like...unwashed lady bits...if you know what I mean... ...send help...🤣
customer_reviews.author: happycamper

customer_reviews.title: less smell than the big ones!
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog who is a major chewer, and I had bought extra large sticks in the hopes it would last him. However, they smelled horrendous even though they were listed as "odorless"!! These braided ones don't smell for whatever reason and last a good while. These are now my go-to bully sticks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nony Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Peaceful mornings
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old Gordon Setter loves these Bully sticks and they last at least 1-2 days. Thank you for making a product that lets me drink my morning coffee in peace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m told they’re delicious
customer_reviews.text: My dog is picky and these are her favorite bully sticks. She’s a one year old, 45 pound pitbull and destroys standard bully sticks in minutes, but these last a day of on and off chewing. I cringe at the price but they’re worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Suzuki

customer_reviews.title: Getting smaller and thinner?
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, the entire bag seemed to be much thinner. You pay for a certain quantity and hope that they're all about the same size and weight, but this bag seemed to have much smaller braids than usual. Dog loves them and they keep his teeth clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dobielover

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I have an Australian Shepherd and she absolutely loves these bully sticks. She will sit there and eat it until it is gone, which generally takes her a couple of hours. The scent is not too overpowering and it doesn't make her breath smell bad like some other bully sticks we have tried do.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Got the 5 sticks pack, and the width of the sticks were very inconsistent. Out of 5 in the bag, only 2 were the width shown n the picture. The rest were ranging from really thin half inch to a bit more than that. My 5 months old labradoodle chewed threw the thin ones in one day! Cost per bone would make more sense if consistency was better. Was going to buy a larger pack but now will look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Dog LOVED this chew
customer_reviews.text: My Great Dane loved this chew, laid down with the chew (which was a substantial size) in between her paws and chewed, chewed, chewed for 15 minutes and it was gone. She loved it but it was gone very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, but my 25lb 6 month old puppy chewed the first one in just a few hours. I got these specifically because they are supposed to last a long time, but they did not. Way too expensive for 5 sticks that don't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Stinky, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these bully treats; both the regular sticks and the braided ones. They keep his puppy teeth happy and occupied 😁🎉 However they do stink a bit so they get used more outside at my house. Definitely worth it though, I’ll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: Good but don't last long
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loved it but it didn't last that long. My puppy is 6 months and recently got her permanent teeth. I was looking for something that lasted longer to keep her occupied but these lasted about 20min... It's too expensive for so little durability. It also smells like a man's feet after taking his sneakers off after using it the whole day and playing soccer in it... it stinks your couch too if your pooch decides to chew it on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: SilRivera

customer_reviews.title: My 32 lb lab mix demolishes these by the hour
customer_reviews.text: My lab can polish one of these bones off in just under an hour without breaking much of a sweat, she absolutely adores them, and to the creator's credit these do last substantially longer than traditional single strand bully sticks, however, once the stick gets down to it's final third it has a nasty tendency to unwind back into three single sticks, if you're not paying close attention this can lead to a much larger than wanted piece being swallowed and thus i find myself having to take these away from my pup a bit sooner than other sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Huston

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved but slight funky odor.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved these! She went through one within an hour so we will probably but the next one we give her. The smell isn’t as bad as most bully sticks but there is a light funky odor. Not sure I would buy again because they were kind of pricey but it was a nice Christmas gift for our girl.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Our pup's number one chew!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say the last two shipments have been different than the first four or five. These are a different color and texture. Not sure why...but they don't seem to have the same smell or texture the first ones did. Our pup isn't as excited about them as she was before. We're not as happy with the last two shipments as we were before. She still enjoys them...but doesn't pick them out like she did before.
customer_reviews.author: Christel Lopez-Berryman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my pup busy
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these sticks. She's ten months old and has tons of energy in her - more than I can keep up with most of the time. When I want to kick back, I give her one of these sticks and it keeps her occupied for at least four hours. The sticks don't have a strong odor, so I don't mind giving them to her in the house. An overall very nice treat, I always come back for more!
customer_reviews.author: Nate N.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: These bully sticks are perfect! My usual supplier stopped selling them so I was extremely happy when I found Pawstruck. The chews are just like the ones that had been discontinued. The braided bully sticks are much better than the single stick ones as the keep my dog's teeth cleaner and more importantly my dog is happy again! Thank you Pawstruck :)
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: The bully sticks look fantastic. Once we let our dog have one
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived with a tear in the bottom of the plastic braided bully stick package. It seems that the padded envelope isn't enough protection for the product to arrive undamaged. We are hopeful that this tear wasn't present prior to the packaging....and it was sent to us damaged. The bully sticks look fantastic. Once we let our dog have one, we will know more about how it was enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Mn reader

customer_reviews.title: My dog and I love these bully sticks
customer_reviews.text: My dog and I love these bully sticks! Pawstruck is great, I've ordered these sticks a few times now. My dog loves them, they last longer than some of the other bully items I've tried (rings, smaller/shorter braids, etc). And the customer service is great, fast shipping...love the confirmation emails from the Chief Canine Officer Tyson :) Highly recommended, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product and was very pleased with the great price since in pet stores the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and was very pleased with the great price since in pet stores the 12'' braided bully sticks run about $18 a piece! One thing that was disappointing was the size difference in the 5 pieces. 3 of them were very thick and sturdy but 2 of them were very thin and flimsy. My pup still loves them it just took him half the time to eat the smaller two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big hit...wish they lasted longer.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these. I was hoping with it being braided that it would last longer, but she can down this 12 inch braided stick in an hour. Expensive for an hour of chewing. But with that said, I will keep buying them because they keep her busy and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: PictureNana

customer_reviews.title: Gone in 30 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I just gave one of these to my German Shepherd/Husky puppy....she's 6 mos. old and she's demolished it in 30 mins....I was hoping to get a couple hours of peace and quiet but she's got one strong jaw!!.....she loves it, which is good, but for the price, it's not worth it to me......
customer_reviews.author: Tami Westwood

customer_reviews.title: My pitbull loved these. They helped keep him occupied
customer_reviews.text: My pitbull loved these. They helped keep him occupied. He loves chewing on our stuff (shoes, couch, toilet paper, etc.) I will definitely purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: SheiLae19

customer_reviews.title: Doggo loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Remi loves pretty much all bully sticks but since these are braided they last a bit longer. Most of the bully sticks in the package were pretty consistent in size, only one was significantly thinner than the others. The price was good too since these things are normally pretty expensive. Just a great quality treat my dog loves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last much longer than single sticks
customer_reviews.text: Take out 90 lb Bernese mountain dog about 2.5 hours to get through one of these, 2 if she is determined. Last a lot longer than the single sticks, which she would finish in 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it but it's too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really loved the Braided Bully Sticks but it takes them about 20 minutes to eat one Bully Stick. I paid 40 dollars for my 5 Bully Sticks and I have two dogs that weigh 20 pounds each. I don't think I want to pay 8 DOLLARS A Bully Stick that lasts 20 minutes for a Scottish Terrier and a Westy that each weigh 20 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN C. CALLISON

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously addictive. My dogs love these.
customer_reviews.text: All I have to do is show them the package, and they start dancing. These are awesome and gently on the tummies. Unlike rawhide, which created a big problem for my girls.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Manning

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the other ones I have purchased from someone else, however, these are thinner than the ones I usually buy but overall they last a little while and my dogs did like them.
customer_reviews.author: HOBBY HORSE

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect chew!
customer_reviews.text: 3 have last over 2 months and my breed is a high chewer...loves to chew on couch and shoes. Needed something to keep interested..This did the trick. Price and longevity of chews are awesome! Would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent thickness
customer_reviews.text: I am a loyal Pawstuck customer but was very disappointed by the quality of these 12” braided bully sticks because most of them are quite thin. I normally purchase the 9” braids which are thick and substantial and take our puppy a good 30 minutes to chew through. I paid significantly more for the 12” bag thinking they would extend her chew time. However, most of them are skinny and flimsy - she will chew through them in 10 minutes. Very disappointed. We have a 10 month old Doberman - hound mix. Aggressive chewer!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Chubbuck

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my pug, lab mix, and pit bull boxer mix because they had a lot of plaque build up that wouldn’t come off from scraping/brushing. I ordered these and the first day of them chewing on it I noticed a big difference in their teeth! It’s the fourth day of them eating the bones and the plaque is almost off their teeth. Will definitely order again. It also keeps them busy for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you dog like them
customer_reviews.text: I don’t doubt if they are all natural, I am pretty sure this is good treat, the only reason I am returning is my dog doesn’t like them at all, she smells them and then walk away
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: It is as described. I was hoping it would take my 11 month old puppy a bit longer than a few hours to devour this but.... No luck. He loves it and it gives him something to chew on.
customer_reviews.author: crbrlrsn

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved them. Postponed the de-stuffing of his other toys ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog loved them. Postponed the de-stuffing of his other toys for a while, pretty impressive because even when he’s not chewing, he’s still chewing. Little pricey I feel, but they’re all pretty much about the same price from other brands. Way cheaper than the retail pet stores around here when comparing length and quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: If you absolutely need 30 minutes of uninterrupted time, these will do the trick! Both my dogs love these. My dogs were able to finish a whole one in 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kalen Vavla

product_meta.title: Pawstruck 12" Braided Bully Sticks for Dogs - Natural Bulk Dog Dental Treats & Healthy Chews, Chemical Free, 12 inch Best Low Odor Pizzle Stix
product_meta.description: Size:10 Stick(s)Our 12-inch Braided Bully Sticks are made up of three of our greatest bully sticks braided together to make a durable dog treat. Besides being long-lasting, the natural chewing action and saliva generation helps promote healthy teeth and gums. Additionally, these dog treats are completely natural with no artificial preservatives of any kind. We take the time to slowly roast all of our bully sticks making them a tasty option for any breed of dog. Like the rest of our dog treats and dog chews, these braided bully sticks come from free-range, grass-fed cattle. We only buy from facilities that are approved by all relevant governing bodies to make sure you are receiving one of the highest quality dog treats on the market.
feature_bullets: All of our braided bully sticks for dogs are made by intertwining 3 sticks and contain NO artificial ingredients, NO hormones, and NO chemicals. These all-natural beef pizzle dog treats are long-lasting and made from free range, grass fed cattle. We source the highest quality ingredients ensuring a premium low-odor product that your dog will love.

Dog dental care is important! These natural dog dental chews help to remove harmful plaque and tartar leading to improvements in overall dental health. Let your dog chew on these dental treats and watch his teeth sparkle.

Our natural beef bully stix for dogs are made in our own South American facilities to ensure the healthiest and safest possible dog chews. Our processing plant adheres to the strictest of quality assurance standards. Additionally, our facilities are up to governing body and outside 3rd party USA standards.

If you're worried about cost, we've got your back! We offer lots of pack sizes to help you save money. Buy our standard bulk bully sticks and your wallet will thank you. Generally we carry bulk dog chews in sizes of 10, 25, 50, 100, 250, and up. If you've got an even bigger order, shoot us a message and we'll be happy to accommodate a lower price per stick.

At Pawstruck, we want you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. That's why we stand behind our 30 day SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! If these aren't the best and most natural bully sticks you've ever purchased, our customer care team is ready to help. With a huge selection of Dog Chews, Dog Bones, Antlers, and more, we're confident we'll find something to suite your needs.
